title: How to Draw a Stick Figure

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head.

steps.title: Draw a cross connected to the head.
steps.content: Draw a cross connected to the head.

steps.title: Draw two legs branching from the bottom of the cross.
steps.content: Draw two legs branching from the bottom of the cross. On the cross make sure the horizontal line is shorter than the vertical line.

steps.title: Draw a curve or a straight line at the lower half of the circle.
steps.content: Draw a curve or a straight line at the lower half of the circle. If you want teeth, draw two triangles sprouting from the line.

steps.title: Draw two eyes.
steps.content: Draw two eyes. You can draw: A dot. It's the fastest way. Two circles with a dot in the middle. Two merged eyes to show fear or surprise. Dollar signs ($) and hearts (❤️) can replace pupils to show expressions.

steps.title: Draw a dot for the nose.
steps.content: Draw a dot for the nose.
